name: THE ALTAR
description:
Mary (the oldest) and Elizabeth (the youngest) are sisters that don't really speak with each other, even though they live in the same city. Life just happens.

Liz, it seems, has disappeared. She hasn't been answerng her phone and hasn't posted to social media for a couple of weeks.

Mary and Liz's mother has tasked Mary for finding her before they go to the police.
